headline.print_headline: Steve Paul, 71; Owned ’60s Club in New York
headline.seo: Steve Paul, Owner of the Former Scene Nightclub, Dies at 71
headline.main: Steve Paul Dies at 71; Owned ’60s Club in New York

docs.snippet: Mr. Paul opened the Scene in 1964. It became famous for brilliant moments in the history of rock music, as the place where Pink Floyd and the Doors shaped the music of the era....
docs.abstract: Steve Paul, owner of popular New York City nightclub in 1960s called The Scene, dies at age 71.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Paul opened the Scene in 1964. It became famous for brilliant moments in the history of rock music, as the place where Pink Floyd and the Doors shaped the music of the era.

headline.print_headline: Getting More Bang for the Fed’s Buck
headline.seo: Why the Fed Should Buy Munis — Not Mortgages
headline.main: Getting More Bang for the Fed’s Buck

docs.snippet: The Fed could lift the economy more by buying muni bonds instead of mortgages....
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by law Profs Joseph A Grundfest, Mark A Lemley and George G Triantis questions whether mortgage market is smartest place for Federal Reserve to spend its money; suggests Fed could lift economy more efficiently by buying municipal bonds.

byline.original: By JOSEPH A. GRUNDFEST, MARK A. LEMLEY and GEORGE G. TRIANTIS

docs.lead_paragraph: The Fed could lift the economy more by buying muni bonds instead of mortgages.

headline.print_headline: Who Threw Israel Under the Bus?
headline.seo: Who Threw Israel Under the Bus?
headline.main: Who Threw Israel Under the Bus?

docs.snippet: Whenever the United States has put serious, sustained pressure on Israel’s leaders, it has come from Republican presidents, not Democrats....
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Israeli security expert Efraim Halevy disputes Mitt Romney's assertion that Pres Obama has created tension and turmoil in America's relationship with Israel; contends history shows that it is usually Republican presidents who have strained relations with Israel.
docs.lead_paragraph: Whenever the United States has put serious, sustained pressure on Israel’s leaders, it has come from Republican presidents, not Democrats.

docs.snippet: Canada’s plan to build a pipeline to its west coast for shipping to Asia has become mired in domestic politics thick enough to rival the tarlike oil it hopes to sell....

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
keywords.name: glocations

docs.abstract: Canada’s plan to build an oil pipeline to its west coast for shipping to Asia has become mired in domestic politics, as missteps by Enbridge Northern Gateway Project raise ire of British Columbians who once supported the plan.
docs.lead_paragraph: Canada’s plan to build a pipeline to its west coast for shipping to Asia has become mired in domestic politics thick enough to rival the tarlike oil it hopes to sell.

headline.seo: Paul Kurtz, Humanist and Philosopher, Dead at 86

docs.snippet: Mr. Kurtz was a philosophy professor, but his wider influence came as a writer and publisher of books and magazines advocating reason over faith....
docs.abstract: Paul Kurtz, publisher and philosopher whose advocacy of reason ahead of faith helped define contemporary secular humanism, dies at age 86.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Kurtz was a philosophy professor, but his wider influence came as a writer and publisher of books and magazines advocating reason over faith.

headline.print_headline: California: Surfer Dies In Shark Attack
headline.main: California: Surfer Dies in Shark Attack

docs.snippet: A surfer was killed by a shark on Tuesday off a beach at Vandenberg Air Force Base, the authorities said....
docs.abstract: Francisco Javier Solorio Jr is killed by shark while surfing off a beach in Lompoc, Calif.
docs.lead_paragraph: A surfer was killed by a shark on Tuesday off a beach at Vandenberg Air Force Base, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Racially Based Attack Is Debunked
headline.main: Louisiana: Racially Based Attack Is Debunked

docs.snippet: A 20-year-old black woman who was found badly burned in a park in northern Louisiana on Sunday night had tried to make the episode appear to be a racially motivated attack, the authorities said....
docs.abstract: Authorities say that Sharmeka Moffitt, black woman who was found badly burned in a park in northern Louisiana, had tried to make the episode appear to be a racially motivated attack, but her injuries appear to be self-inflicted.
docs.lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old black woman who was found badly burned in a park in northern Louisiana on Sunday night had tried to make the episode appear to be a racially motivated attack, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: Egyptian Court Declines to Rule on the Legality of Drafting a New Constitution
headline.seo: Egyptian Court Declines to Halt Constitution Work
headline.main: Egyptian Court Declines to Rule on the Legality of Drafting a New Constitution

docs.snippet: A ruling on dissolving the predominately Islamist constitutional committee was deferred to a higher authority, a decision that could allow time for the work to be completed....
docs.abstract: Egyptian court declines to rule on legality of committee drafting Egypt's Constitution, dealing setback to critics who have called committee unrepresentative and too heavily dominated by Islamists; decision seems to ensure that current group of authors will have time to finish their work.

byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MAYY EL SHEIKH

docs.lead_paragraph: A ruling on dissolving the predominately Islamist constitutional committee was deferred to a higher authority, a decision that could allow time for the work to be completed.

docs.snippet: The deaths of three women and a toddler in southern Tennessee may be related to a body found just across the state line in Alabama, the authorities said Tuesday....
docs.abstract: Deaths of three women and a toddler in southern Tennessee may be related to a body of man found just across the state line in Alabama, tentatively identified as that of Warren V Crutcher, who had been sought for questioning in the attacks.
docs.lead_paragraph: The deaths of three women and a toddler in southern Tennessee may be related to a body found just across the state line in Alabama, the authorities said Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Questions Linger on Battery Prices Electric Cars
headline.seo: Questions Linger on Battery Prices in Electric Car Industry
headline.main: Questions Linger on Battery Prices in Electric Cars

docs.snippet: Carmakers wonder if the lithium-ion cells will become cheap enough, at a fast enough pace, to make pure electric and plug-in hybrid cars economically practical....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmakers wonder if the lithium-ion cells will become cheap enough, at a fast enough pace, to make pure electric and plug-in hybrid cars economically practical.
